short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move Twitter's "Promoted" label to the top of tweets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Move Twitter's "Promoted" label to the top of tweets.

This also works for trends and "who to follow".

This supports Engish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Czech, German & Spanish interfaces of Twitter.

This is a beta version. Please share your ideas with me via https://becausecurious.me/contact.
